Feb 17

Becoming a List Import Wizard

New Feature Friday

Whether we’re unveiling significantly new functionality or rolling out a regular update, iterating on success is what Iterable is all about. Today’s New Feature Friday improves an important part of every growth marketer’s toolkit.

Iterable customers can now import lists and preview data using our newly redesigned interface. We’ve also added two new data types, so you can now set user fields as string, boolean or date.

Uploading lists allows you to add users into your system without needing the help of an engineer. For CSV files, make sure to follow our list import best practices, such as eliminating duplicate or empty headers and ensuring valid email addresses.

Want to jump right in? Here is how to make the magic happen.

  • Step 1: Underneath the Users tab, select Import List or click the Import List button on the Lists page to get started.
  • Step 2: Name your list, select a type and choose your file.
  • Step 3: Verify the accuracy of your list. Once everything looks correct, click Upload Subscribers.
  • Step 4: Review the details and choose to upload another list if needed. Congrats, you’re a list import wizard!

Learn more about importing lists in our support article and reach out to our Customer Success team if you have any questions.

Want to add yourself to our ever-growing list of customers? Request a demo of our growth marketing platform today.
